title: How much does Stephen King make per book? - Quora

response.answer_text: Stephen King, being the popular fellow he is, has many streams of income from his books including sales, international sales, film/television rights and even some income from vocal rights for the times he’s read his material himself. The mind boggles to quote the film version of Holly Golightly. BTW, there is only a minute chance of you becoming the next Stephen King.
